title: The Conservatives will only win the next election with a powerful vision for life after Brexit
text:
Across the country there is a burning desire for resolution​

There is no doubt that the Extinction Rebellion campaigners hold their self righteous beliefs very strongly. However as The Telegraph reported last week, their antics on the streets have landed us all with an immediate cost, well above the £37 million in extra police pay and other costs.

One of Britain's most senior officers has said that some policing was not done at all, while other pressing investigations were delayed as a result. In short; victims of crime have been let down.

Similar feelings of despair and frustration were echoed by my fellow guests at a weekend house party in Norfolk. Remainers and Leavers alike expressed anger...
description: Across the country there is a burning desire for resolution​
